markdown:
Sharing session with CIAM UTM and Core Expert Systems Sdn. Bhd.
===============================================================

by [attpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/attpic/ "Posts by attpic")
 | Aug 15, 2016 | [ATT](https://fke.utm.my/category/att/)

Thank you to Prof. Zainal Abdul Aziz from CIAM for inviting us to a sharing session with one of the brilliant directors from Core Expert Systems Sdn. Bhd. (CES). Thank you also to Dr. Ahmad Azlan Mohd Yasir for sharing with us your marvelous projects and ideas especially on the future of drones. Your presentation have opened our eyes to a diversity of things that we can work on. Inshaa Allah this will not be the last of our meetings.

![photo589152651702282207](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/photo589152651702282207.jpg)

![photo551052782798481372](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/photo551052782798481372.jpg) ![photo551052782798481373](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/photo551052782798481373.jpg)

![photo551052782798481374](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/photo551052782798481374.jpg)

Side story: After the sharing session, Dr. Azlan gave a little demo showing one of the drones that Core Expert System has to incite our curiosity and interest in drones. It was truly an interesting experience. The video of the demo can be watched through link below.

[Drone demonstration video](https://www.facebook.com/ATTfkeUTM/videos/945319165597141/)
